title: Maxwell's Inspection
description: There comes a time in every teacher's life when he must face his Nemesis - the Ofsted Inspection. On the third day one of the Inspectors is found stabbed to death. Events move quickly and the Head is arrested on suspicion of the murder. But Peter Maxwell, Head of Sixth Form, cannot help but notice that the Ofsted Humanities expert, is not distraught at her colleague's death. But is it that simple? Maxwell sets out to prove that the Head is innocent. And the only way to do it is to take on the Inspectors one by one...
author: M.J. Trow
